page.title: 18LEISURE - RIDING SCHOOLS
page.content: Shareshill is fortunate in having two riding schools in the village,the oldest of which opened 2l years ago.It caters for pupils of all ages from a very wide area.It is home for 25 horses including some livery,which are brought in to the stables each day from nearby fields which are rented for grazing.The school concentrates on teaching with great emphasis on safety.All rides in the surrounding lanes are escorted by trained riders.During school holidays two- and three-day courses are held on horse and stable management.The school always provides ponies for the church fete and other charitable events.Fred the donkey - believed to be over 3O - is a well-loved village character and likes to be taken for a walk by the village children.
